Name: GunQuest
About the game: GunQuest is an action RPG where you use firearms to combat fantasy creatures. Find and craft guns, trade with natives, upgrade your armory, and conquer the infinite plain in GunQuest! Interact with the Developer Also, Psst... GunQuest has a discord server! Follow the development process and give input on the direction of the game! Gameplay Features Overworld Caravan Travel! Fast paced combat! Enemy Variety! Interesting NPCs! Dynamic Dialogue Options! Features In Production NPCs travel in tandem with the caravan! New playable characters! Native Tribe Weapons! Extended Map Size! Bullet Type Variety! Rune/Magic System for Guns! Crafting System! Caravan Upgrade System! Find New Weapons! Fight Enemies! Interact with NPCs!
Meta Title: GunQuest: Jul 1, 2022, Restless Gamedev and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on GunQuest? Check out the release date (Jul 1, 2022), developer insights from Restless Gamedev, and a complete game summary.
